definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.chinese: 問之其實已有十年之心律不整病史。

sentences.english: Genetic counseling should be considered for individuals with a family history of albinism or hypopigmentation.
sentences.chinese: 遺傳諮詢應考慮個人與家族病史白化或色素缺失。

sentences.english: Background. The clinical history of a given pigmented lesion could in fluence the therapeutic decision.
sentences.chinese: 一個色素性皮損的臨牀病史影響其治療方案的制訂。

sentences.english: In addition, the patient or surrogate may correct any historical misinformation at this time.
sentences.chinese: 病人或代訴者還可在此時糾正病史中的一些錯誤信息。

sentences.english: This patient presented with Cushing's syndrome and hypertension.
sentences.chinese: 這個病人有庫興氏綜合徵和高血壓病史。

sentences.english: His recent history included exposure to dead chickens in his neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 他的近期病史包括在居住區接觸死雞。

sentences.english: History, clinical signs, postmortem results & whole blood levels of lead.
sentences.chinese: 病史，臨牀症狀，屍體剖檢和全血鉛水平。

sentences.english: Careful attention to history is of ital importance to the diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 仔細留意病史對於診斷是至關重要的。

sentences.english: Results All patients had the history of breathing difficulty before tracheomalacia.
sentences.chinese: 結果氣管軟化患者術前均有呼吸困難病史。

sentences.english: A history of cerebrovascular or peripheral vascular disease increases the likelihood of associated CAD.
sentences.chinese: 腦血管或周圍血管病病史可增加相關CAD的可能性。

sentences.english: History of poor response to ovarian stimulation was a strong indicator for declining ovarian function.
sentences.chinese: 促排卵反應不良病史也是卵巢低反應性的影響因素。

sentences.english: Based on history, hematogenous metastases is most likely.
sentences.chinese: 基於病史，本例最可能是血行性轉移。

sentences.english: The majority of women had a recent diagnosis, or history of, cervical carcinoma or myoma.
sentences.chinese: 大部分新近診斷爲或者病史是子宮癌或者肌瘤。

sentences.english: A presumptive diagnosis of pancreatitis can be made based on a history and physical examination.
sentences.chinese: 胰腺炎可以根據病史和體格檢查作出初步診斷。

sentences.english: None of the participants was a smoker or had diabetes or high blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 受試者沒有嗜煙或者罹患糖尿病高血壓的病史。

sentences.english: CRVO group had longer history and less visual improvement after surgery.
sentences.chinese: CRVO組病史較長，手術後視力改善較少。

definition: to make a definite diagnosis/confirmed (case of a specific disease)
to accompany/(of a doctor etc) to do a follow-up (on a patient, client etc)
to contract (an illness)/to be afflicted with/to suffer from
